Package de.iss.mv2.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cloneable<T>
    A class thats content can be cloned.
    MessageCryptorSettings
    Configures the cryptographic processing of all processed messages.
    SignatureProvider
    A class that can be used to create an instance of Signature.
    SymetricKeyGenerator
    Used to generate symmetric keys for the encrypted communication.
    UnambiguityPovider<T>
    A provider for checking if a value is unique in a certain context.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AESInputStream
    Specifies an InputStream to read AES-encrypted data.
    AESKeyGenerator
    A class for generating random AES-keys.
    AESOutputStream
    Eine Ausgabe-Stream-Klasse zur AES-verschlüsselten ausgabe von Daten.
    AESWithRSACryptoSettings
    The default cryptographic settings using the AES-algorithm for symmetric and the RSA-algorithm for asymmetric encryption.
    CertificateLoader
    A class for reading a PKCS encoded X509Certificate from different sources.
    CertificateNameReader
    Reader for parsing information from a given distinguished name.
    CertificateSigner
    A class to sign a given certificate signing request with an existing certificate.
    CertificateSigningRequest
    Represents a certificate signing request.
    CertificateVerificationResult
    Contains the result of a certificate verification.
    CertificateVerifier
    Class for building a certification chain for given certificate and verifying it.
    CRLVerifier
    Class that verifies CRLs for given X509 certificate.
    KeyStrengthUmlimiter Deprecated
    The functionality of this class may violate oracles terms of use and should not be used.
    MailCertificateVerifier
    A class to verify a clients certificate.
    PassphraseInflator
    A helper class to generate a second passphrase form a given one.
    PEMFileIO
    A class to read and write different PKCS entities from or to a stream.
    RSAInputStream
    Ein EingabeStream zur RSA-Entschlüsselung von Eingabedaten.

    Hinweis: Die Hinweise bzgl.
    RSAOutputStream
    Ein Ausgabe-Stream zur RSA-Verschlüsselung.

    Hinweis: Die Hinweise bzgl.
    SHA256WithRSASignatureProvider
    A object to create a SHA256 with RSA Signature.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CertificateVerificationException
    An exception that is thrown if the verification of a X509Certificate fails.
    CryptoException
    Stellte eine Ver-/Entschlüsselungs zugeordnete Exception zur Verfügung.
